name: Erdadok 2
description:
Welcome to Erdadok 2! 

How to play

To navigate the map, use WASD to control the camera!

Use the cursor and the left mouse button to click on icons and to build/collect/destroy!

To Collect press 1

To Build press 2

To Destroy press 3

Note that building is only possible with the building menu open!

Collect is only possible with the building menu closed, and only for Forest or Stone tiles.

Destroy is only possible with the building menu closed, and only for Build tiles.

=========================================================

Game made for LowRezJam 2021 
by Roberto Romao

musics by Eric Matyas

  1. A-Meadow-of-Mysteries
  2. Beyond-the-Valley-of-Dreams
  3. Cruising-Back-in-Time
  4. Key-West-Sunset
  5. Of-Castles-Magic-and-Spells_Remixed
  6. Of-Legends-and-Fables-2
  7. The-Lost-Island-of-Jewels
  8. Ye-Olde-Pub_Looping

soundimage.org

[Downloading the Game Guide is HIGHLY recommended]

Lore...

After a brutal war with the Kalico Empire, our nation was able to acquire the land to the East, called Erdadok! As someone seeking to improve your status with the Royal Court, you were awarded with a plot of land to build and settle in Erdadok!

Supplies and gold will be provided for you to start!

Glory to the Empire!

========================================
